# Common Distribution ## Beta Distribution | Property | Description | |------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **Name** | Beta distribution | | **Notation** | $\text{Beta}(\alpha, \beta)$ | | **Parameters** | $\alpha > 0$: shape; $\beta > 0$: shape | | **Support** | $x \in (0, 1)$ | | **PDF** | $f(x) = \dfrac{x^{\alpha - 1} (1 - x)^{\beta - 1}}{B(\alpha, \beta)}$ | | **CDF** | $F(x) = I_x(\alpha, \beta)$, the regularized incomplete beta function | | **Mean** | $\dfrac{\alpha}{\alpha + \beta}$ | | **Variance** | $\dfrac{\alpha \beta}{(\alpha + \beta)^2 (\alpha + \beta + 1)}$ | | **Special cases**| - $\text{Beta}(1,1)$: Uniform(0,1)
- $\text{Beta}(\alpha, 1)$: Power function
- Conjugate prior for Bernoulli/Binomial likelihood
- General case of the Kumaraswamy distribution | : Summary of the Beta distribution {#tbl-beta} ## Location-Scale *t* Distribution | Property | Description | |------------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------| | **Name** | Location-scale $t$ distribution | | **Notation** | $t(\mu, \sigma, \nu)$ | | **Parameters** | $\mu \in \mathbb{R}$: location; $\sigma > 0$: scale; $\nu > 0$: degrees of freedom | | **Support** | $x \in \mathbb{R}$ | | **PDF** | $f(x) = \dfrac{\Gamma\left(\frac{\nu+1}{2}\right)}{\Gamma\left(\frac{\nu}{2}\right)\sqrt{\nu\pi}\sigma} \left[1 + \dfrac{1}{\nu} \left(\dfrac{x - \mu}{\sigma}\right)^2\right]^{-\frac{\nu+1}{2}}$ | | **CDF** | $F(x) = T_\nu\left(\dfrac{x - \mu}{\sigma}\right)$, where $T_\nu$ is the CDF of the standard $t$ distribution | | **Mean** | $\mu$ for $\nu > 1$; undefined for $\nu \le 1$ | | **Variance** | $\dfrac{\nu \sigma^2}{\nu - 2}$ for $\nu > 2$; infinite for $1 < \nu \le 2$; undefined for $\nu \le 1$ | | **Special cases**| - $t(0,1,\nu)$: standard Student's $t$
- $\nu \to \infty$: converges to $\mathcal{N}(\mu, \sigma^2)$
- Heavy-tailed alternative to the normal distribution | : Summary of the location-scale $t$ distribution {#tbl-t} ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](999-distributions_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-1-1.png){width=672} ::: :::
